page.title: 11My school day
page.content: Some days I come to Ogbourne primary school by car and some days I cycle,I like riding my bicycle if it is not raining.At nine oclock we all go into the assembly room to listen to music, sing songs,and say prayers,sometimes our class is in charge of assembly and some times the infant class does it.In the morning we work at maths,hand writing,story writing.In the afternoon we do games, art,making models,science. Our play time is in the morning.we have 20 minutes,I dont like going out to play unless its hot out side. We have dinner at midday,I have a school dinner,some people have packed lunches,or go home.After dinner we have quiet reading In the library. I go home at 3.15 on the school bus, with fourteen other children. There are 45 children in the school.
